nav.div: Canastota Central School District » District » Coronavirus Updates

div.div:
Canastota CSD continues to respond to COVID-19 and will provide information to our families and community as quickly as we receive it. Below you will find a listing of communication that has been sent to families since the start of this incident.
Please contact your school's main office if you have any questions.
Peterboro Street Elementary School: 315.697.2027
South Side Elementary School: 315.697.6372
Roberts Street Elementary School: 315.697.2029
Junior/Senior High School: 315.697.2003
District Office: 315.697.2025
District Communication and Updates: Update 20: 4/24/20 @ 4:00pm: Student Learning and Feedback Plan
Update 19: 4/7/20 @ 4:00pm: Extended School Closure and Regents Cancellation Q&A
Update 18: 4/3/20 @ 4:00pm: Meal Delivery Updates & Adjustements
Update 17: 3/31/20 @ 7:30pm: Meal Delivery, Instructional Materials & Pickup
Update 16: 3/27/20 @ 6:00pm: District COVID-19 Statement #2
Update 15: 3/27/20 @ 4:00pm: Future Communication about COVID-19 Cases
Update 14: 3/24/20 @ 6:00pm: Message from Madison County DOH
Update 13: 3/22/20 @ 7:20pm: Meal Delivery will Continue
Update 12: 3/22/20 @ 3:15pm: District COVID-19 Statement
Update 11: 3/21/20 @ 2:00pm: March 2020 Closing Timeline Explanation
Update 10: 3/20/20 @ 3:30pm: Child Care for Essential Workers
Update 9: 3/19/20 @ 2:30pm: Meal & Building Access Updates
Update 8: 3/18/20 @ 3:30pm: Meal & Building Access Updates
Update 7: 3/18/20 @ 9:00am: Campus Closed
Update 6: Meals for Students, Academic & Technology Support
Update 5: Meals for Students and Access to School
Update 4: Extended School Closure Announcement
Update 3: Superintendent's Conference Day moved to 3/16/20
Update 2: Update from the Superintendent of Schools
Update 1: Cancellation of Annual Community Celebration
Madison County Resident FAQ's about COVID-19
120 Roberts Street, Canastota, NY 13032 | Phone 315-697-2025 | Fax 315-697-6368
